ingredients.ingredient: 2 large Granny Smith apples, peeled and cored
2 (10 ounce) cans refrigerated crescent roll dough
1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle Mountain Dew ™

cookingTips: Core apples completely without cutting through bottom for easy filling
Wrap dough evenly around apples and seal edges to prevent unraveling
Use the citrus beverage to create a unique sweet-tangy sauce as apples bake
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide on wrapping crescent dough around apples smoothly and explain the role of the sugary beverage in creating sauce.
